definition: east/host (i.e. sitting on east side of guest)/landlord
Han ethnic group/Chinese (language)/the Han dynasty (206 BC-220 AD)

sentences.english: Legend has it that there was a devil in Dynasty of Dong Han.
sentences.chinese: 相传，在东汉时期有一妖怪为祸人间。

sentences.english: The first lion was presented to China during the Eastern Han Dynasty by a king from the Western Regions.
sentences.chinese: 东汉时，西域安息国王向中国献上了第一头狮子。

sentences.english: The formation of the Eastern Han Dynasty confucian classics family depended on the political and cultural aspects.
sentences.chinese: 东汉经学世家的形成取决于政治和文化两个方面。

sentences.english: The Han Dynasty administered Guangdong, Guangxi, and northern Vietnam as Jiao Province.
sentences.chinese: 东汉在此设立交州，管辖两广及越南北部地区。

sentences.english: Mature celadon was achieved in the first century A. D. (Eastern Han dynasty).
sentences.chinese: 成熟青瓷约在公元一世纪的东汉时期烧造成功。

sentences.english: Han dynasty, so called ci card, say again MingCi.
sentences.chinese: 东汉时称为刺，故名片又称名刺。

sentences.english: Furthermore, the upright officials' achievements in politics and culture are the main focus of attention in the Eastern Han history.
sentences.chinese: “江南”循吏的政治文化表现，更是东汉史的亮点。

sentences.english: There are pictures of women playing football at the time of the Eastern Han Dynasty.
sentences.chinese: 在东汉时期就有妇女踢足球的图片记载。

sentences.english: The Chinese translation of Buddhist scriptures went through the important times during the c. 700-year period from the Eastern Han Dynasty to the middle Tang Dynasty.
sentences.chinese: 自东汉至中唐约七百年之间，为佛典汉译的重要时期。

sentences.english: A combination of the two became the general trend in the academic world since the Eastern Han Dynasty.
sentences.chinese: 儒道兼综是东汉以来学术发展的基本趋向。

sentences.english: In the East Han Dynasty Hebei linen fabric textile had also developed in a big way.
sentences.chinese: 东汉时，河北的麻织业也有了较大发展。

sentences.english: At the time of Eastern Han Dynasty, Chijie(to hold the imperial insignia and serve as a diplomatic envoy) was a very important system in the rule of the government.
sentences.chinese: 东汉时期，国家使官员持节是实行统治的重要方式。

sentences.english: When to Eastern Han Dynasty, the hollow brick reduces suddenly, results in vanishes.
sentences.chinese: 东汉时，空心砖骤然减少，终至绝迹。

sentences.english: One year in the Eastern Han Dynasty, there was a serious famine in Henan.
sentences.chinese: 东汉时的某一年，河南一带，饥荒严重。

sentences.english: Marong was a famous educator in the Eastern Han Dynasty.
sentences.chinese: 马融是我国东汉时期著名的教育家。

sentences.english: Apprenticeships were a common means of educating new physicians in the Western Han Dynasties.
sentences.chinese: 师徒相授制度是东汉常见的培训医师方法。

definition: Western Han Dynasty (206 BC-8 AD), also called 前漢|前汉[Qian2 Han4], Former Han Dynasty
Han dynasty (206 BC-220 AD)/refers to the Western Han and Eastern Han
Later Han or Eastern Han dynasty (25-220)/Later Han of the Five Dynasties (947-950)
Wei, Jin and North-South dynasties/generic term for historic period 220-589 between Han and Sui
Wei of the Northern Dynasties (386-534), founded by the Tuoba 拓跋 branch of Xianbei 鮮卑|鲜卑
Song of the Southern dynasties (420-479), with capital at Nanjing/also known as Liu Song 劉宋|刘宋
